text: Lisa Robertson (born 13 October 1961) is a Canadian rower. She competed in the women's eight event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Victoria, British Columbia Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Canada Category:Rowers at the 1986 Commonwealth Games
title: Lisa Robertson (rower)
